effect.name: NinePatch Redux
effect.author: asker
effect.description:
Create custom-scaled graphical boxes with ease
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:55

parameter.name: X Scale factor
parameter.description: Update this to the object's current X Scale

parameter.name: Y Scale factor
parameter.description: Update this to the object's current Y Scale

parameter.name: Repeat pattern
parameter.description: Enable to have the pattern repeat instead of stretch.
